ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // “Listen…you gotta ride in on a
Chocobo you've raised yourself.”{PAUSE}“Then, if you bring your Chocobo to
this stable, you can let it rest
here.”{PAUSE}“I'll take care of it for you.”{PAUSE}“What? How do you raise a Chocobo?
Can't say I know much about that.”{PAUSE}“If you want to know about raising Chocobo,
there's a {CYAN}Chocobo ranch{WHITE} near Midgar.
You should ask them.”

dialogStrings:
“I'm bored…
I want to ride a Chocobo.”
{CHOICE}How do I?
{CHOICE}Later

“Listen…you gotta ride in on a
Chocobo you've raised yourself.”{PAUSE}“Then, if you bring your Chocobo to
this stable, you can let it rest
here.”{PAUSE}“I'll take care of it for you.”{PAUSE}“What? How do you raise a Chocobo?
Can't say I know much about that.”{PAUSE}“If you want to know about raising Chocobo,
there's a {CYAN}Chocobo ranch{WHITE} near Midgar.
You should ask them.”
